title: Full Stack Software Developer (intern)
description: Developed and launched a full-stack property management platform using Django Rest Framework, Python, React, and Git, taking over a partially built system and delivering a stable MVP focused on maintainability and performance.
Developed a responsive, component-based frontend with Tailwind CSS, integrating API-driven views and building a CMS and admin dashboard for 20+ properties and 50+ users.
Mentored 2 junior interns through Jira, code reviews and pair programming, supporting team growth.
